1.content: Why is Videl wearing diapers?
1.title: Beginning

choices: finds some in Gohan's house (for Goten)
somehow just comes to mind one day
she considers the possibility after wetting the bed
gets into them while surfing the internet
11.content: how/why does she become curious in the first place?
11.title: She's curious

choices: "Would they... Nah, what am I thinking?" (Returns to Gohan, continues training)
Her thoughts are interrupted as someone else comes into the bathroom
111.content:
"Phew!!" Videl panted, exhausted from a long afternoon's training. It'd been several weeks now, but she felt like she was finally getting the hang of this 'Ki' stuff Gohan was teaching her. And hey! She even flew pretty high today, and could control her flight well enough to play 'sky tag' with his little brother, Goten. Though, unfortunately, not well enough to actually beat him at his little game.

"Hey, where are you going?" Gohan asked as Videl walked away from their training ground.

"Mind if I use your house's bathroom?" Videl asked sheepishly. "I kinda need it."

"Can't you just go in the woods?" Goten asked, touching down next to his big brother.

"Goten!" Gohan and Videl shouted at him together.

"Uh, go ahead." Gohan said sheepishly, Videl already having run off before he even got the chance to respond.

"What??" Goten shrugged, wondering what he said wrong.

"Um... See, Goten..." Gohan sighed, giving his brother a brief talk on how to talk around girls like Videl.



Meanwhile, inside the Son household, Videl was hurredly finding the first story bathroom, ignoring Gohan's mother, Chi Chi's little 'hmph' as she passed.

At long last, she sat down on the toilet, and properly relieved herself, letting out all the urine she'd been holding in for the past two hours, a long and satisfied sigh sounding from her lips over the long, drawn out hiss of her pee flowing into the bowl.

Finally, she reached for some toilet paper, but saw the roll to be empty. Sighing, she peered into the bathroom closet to look for a new roll, scanning through packs, boxes, and cases, until she found it... or so she originally thought.

"What the...?" She blurted, pulling out a large pack of what she thought was toilet paper. Instead, it was a package of diapers, which made her blush, putting the pack back where she found it. "Who wears these?" She wondered. Upon glancing at the size, which was that of a child's, she understood they had to be Goten's (it wouldn't be uncommon for a boy his age to wet the bed, she thought). Rememebering why she was looking through this closet, she found a new roll of toilet paper, wiped her nether regions, and flushed, concluding her bathroom break.... although....

She turned back to the pack of diapers again, though had no idea why. She reached a hand into the pack, feeling one of the diapers against her hand.

"Soft..." She thought, a blush creeping across her face. "I wonder....?"
111.title: finds some in Gohan's house (for Goten)

choices: A perfect, comfortable fit for her tight little waist!
It just BARELY fit her, the child-sized diaper very  tight around her body
It didn't fit at all (Well, it's a kid's diaper, what'd you expect?)
1111.content:
Sighing at her own temptation, Videl locked the door, took down her pants and panties, and pulled out a diaper from the pack. She unfolded it, taking a second to feel how soft and crinkly it was, before putting down the toilet seat and setting the diaper down on top of it. She sat down on the padded rear, already feeling further enticed to put it all the way on, and leaning back slightly, pulled the front up over her privates, a satisfied blush creeping across her face.

Then, she tried to tape up the diaper, enveloping her lower body in the cushiony bliss......
1111.title: "Would they fit me?" (Tries one on)

1113.title: Her thoughts are interrupted as someone else co...

11132.content:
When Goten walked it the bathroom he saw Gohan’s Friend (aka Videl) that Big Bro was teaching her how to fly along with me as well both. Videl and Goten we’re blushing for pretty obvious reasons.

Videl for being caught with her hand in Goten’s box of diaper’s which is embarrassing enough but for the one who wears them was even more embarrassing. While Goten was embarrassed because she found his diapers but he also thought she needed diapers just like him and bluntly said, Ms. Videl do you need diapers I don’t mind if you take some if you want I have much more in mine and Big Bro’s room if you want to wear one with me.

Videl was surprised that Goten had offered her this she thought for a little bit and said sure but first can I try one of these on as she pulls a diaper out of the box from under the sink as Goten said sure can you lay down and lower your pants and underwear so I can put it on you. So Videl just took her pants of to make it easier for Goten, after she did that Goten slid the diaper under her butt and folded it up over her front and started to do the tapes once he finished he handed Videl her pants to so she could cover the diaper, Videl told Goten that she didn’t need her underwear so Goten threw them in the laundry basket.

Then Videl and Goten went to Goten’s room so that they could wear some diapers together.
which one’s do they look at first.
11132.title: Goten

choices: Go along with Chichi's idea and see it leads
Try to resist Chichi and run away
11133.content:
Just as Videl had stuck her hand into the package of diapers the bathroom door slowly swung open only to reveal the Son family matriarch Chichi standing there shocked and slightly startled. "Oh I'm so sorry Videl! I-" Chichi stopped mid sentence when her eyes registered what it was that Videl was reaching for and when she did she quickly followed up her previous statement with another " You poor girl! Did you have a slight dribble in your pants? Is that why your reaching for one of Gotens old diapers? You could have asked to borrow a pair of mine, you know.". Videl had no idea what was going on but tried to remedy the situation as quickly as possible with her next statement. "I-" Videl tried to say but, was cut off by Chichi "You must be worried that you're going to have another accident. Well if it's worth doing it's worth doing properly, you wait here and I'll be back in a few minutes with every thing we need." with that said Chichi exited the bathroon and took the package of diapers with her leaving Videl standing there with her pant around her ankles. Videl there completely frozen in shock and as she stood there, her mind wander as she thought about what Chichi was going to do and say to her. When Chichi returned she was carrying a bag that contained the package of diapers that she had before as well as some other things "Okay, I've sent the boys away to train with Vegeta and Trunks and, knowing then it means they'll probably be away for a while, I've gotten everything ready in the living room so let's go and you all cleaned up!" exclaimed Chichi excitedly while pulling Videl towards and into the living room. When Videl entered the living room she noticed a large mat which she figured would be used as a changing mat. Her educated was solidified when Chichi led her toward the mat and tried to pull her down while saying "Come on down and we'll get you cleaned up in no time!"

What does Videl do?
11133.title: Chi-Chi

choices: "Sure. Let me find something for you."
111331.content:
"Mrs. Son, was it?" Videl blinked. "Why are you doing this for me? I thought you hated me?"

"No, no, no, Videl, honey!" Chi-Chi laughed. "Why would I hate you??"

"Um...." Videl recalled her early meeting with Chi-chi, and the two got off on a terrible start, Chi-chi even going so far as calling Videl a 'hussy,' as well as showing powerful distaste towards her being around Gohan.

"Oh, that's all ancient history!" Chi-chi giggled. "That's just how a future mother-in-law is supposed to be around her son's future spouse! Gotta show her you're in charge, you know?"

"Eh?!? Future... what???!" Videl blurted, blushing intensely. It was just then that the problem she felt so much shame in started to kick up; whenever Videl got nervous or stressed, she felt the strong urge to pee, much as she did right now.

"Don't think I don't know how you feel about Gohan." Chi-chi smiled warmly. "You two are such a perfect couple, I bet you'll be married in no time. So I gotta be a proper mother-in-law."

"C-couple??" Videl repeated, her bladder pinching even harder.

"Sure, you two have dated, haven't you?" Chi-chi grinned. "Here, take off you pants, I'll get you changed.

"O-okay." Videl sighed, going along with Chi-chi's idea, despite her bladder pinching harder and harder as Gohan's mother not only discussed her relationship with her oldest son, but also saw her half naked. And putting her in a diaper too, no less?! At this rate, she was going to pee right on Chi-chi! "But, um... Gohan and I aren't in a relationship or anything. We haven't even dated before."

"I'm pretty sure that fighting criminals together doesn't count as dating." She thought, as these really were the only moments, outside of classes and training, that she and Gohan were around each other.

"No? Well, that's surprising!" said Chi-Chi, powdering Videl's private areas, making it harder and harder for Videl to not wet herself at this moment. "I'd have thought for sure you two would have gone out several times. I mean, he's training you and everything."

"W-what does that have to do with anything? He's just teaching me how to fly." Videl blinked, as Chi-Chi finished powdering her and got out a diaper.

"Oh, I suppose it would seem strange to you." Chi-Chi said sheepishly as she unfolded the diaper, remembering that Videl was a modern city girl. "Where I come from, it's a sign of strong affection for a boy to train a girl in their arts. When I heard Gohan was teaching you to fly, for me, it was almost like hearing him make a marriage proposal."

At this point, Videl had to hand it to herself that she didn't explode pee all over Chi-Chi as she lifted her ankles to place the diaper under her butt. "S-so he really.....Does Gohan really....???!?!?!!" She stammered in her head.

Finally, Chi-Chi pulled the flap of the diaper over Videl's front, tapping the sides up securely, enveloping the teenage girl in a soft, fluffy cloud of comfort.

"There you go, honey." Chi-Chi smiled sweetly. "How about you take off your shirt and bra too, so I can do your laundry?" She asked.

And with that one question, Videl's bladder hit its breaking point! Unable to hold on anymore, she wet her newly tapped diaper so fast and hard, she could hear the hiss that it gave off as the padding absorbed her urine, and just hoped to god that Chi-Chi didn't.

"Oh my!" Chi-Chi remarked. "It's a good thing that I got you padded when I did, isn't it?"

"Wait, I-!" But again, Videl didn't have time to explain herself as Chi-Chi retrieved her pants and panties, looking regretful of the trickle down the side of the pants, and the small dark spot on her panties.

"You don't have to explain yourself to me, Videl. I understand completely." Chi-Chi assured her. She took off her dress, leaving herself in only a camisole and diaper. "I might as well do some proper laundry while I'm at it. Mind giving me your shirt and bra? I'll put mine in too so it's fair." Videl agreed, and Chi-Chi hauled the clothes off to the wash machine, before returning to sit down with Videl in the living room, still wearing nothing but a diaper.

"Ma'am....?" Videl blinked.

"Just call me Chi-Chi."

"Okay, uh, Chi-Chi. Do you have anything for me to wear while we wait?" Videl asked, covering her bare breasts in her arms.
111331.title: Go along with Chichi's idea and see it leads

choices: clothes that are age appropriate for a young toddler or infant
clothes that are age approprate for a teenager
1113311.content: "Sure Videl you wait right here and I'll see if I can find something that will fit you." that being said Chchi stood up and headed down the hallway of the small home. See that she was alone, Videl allowed her mind to wander as she thought about her current situation and what might happen next; and then there was her budding relationship with Gohan. Videl, however, quickly decided that at this moment in time she did not have the mental capacity to think on that issue. Chichi, having reached the master bedroom, began the arduous task of going through her closet in order to find Videl some clothes. "Yes! Finally!" exclaimed Chichi, after 20 minutes of intense searching, Chichi was sure that she had found the perfect outfit for Videl, which turned out to be...?
1113311.title: Chichi goes to fetch some clothes for Videl.

choices: Videl really likes the clothes and allows Chichi to baby her
Videl does not like the clothes and throws a trantrum
11133111.content: "Hey Videl, close your eyes okay? I want your new outfit to be a surprise." Chichi called out from inside her room. Videl calmly shut her eyes and covered them with her hands so that she wouldn't be tempted to peek before replying "Okay, my eyes are closed now you can come in" Videl heard Chichi quietly walk into the room and lay something down next to her from where she was laying on the floor. Chichi sat the girl up and pulled a shirt on over her head before threading her arms through the holes as well. Then some thin socks were pulled onto her feet, afterwards Videl felt Chichi thread her legs through the holes of what she assumed to be pants. "I'm going to stand you now Videl and when I do I want you to hold on to my shoulders but, no peeking! Your outfit is not complete yet." said Chichi before doing exactly what she said she would. Videl did as she was told and allowed Chichi to pull her up off the floor and then held onto her shoulders as she felt the pants pulled up and two straps pulled up and over her shoulders. "Keep your eyes closed for just a little longer Videl I'm going to take you to a mirror so that you can see yourself in your new outfit" said Chichi as she took Videl's hand and lead her through the house before stopping. "One final thing and then you can open your eyes" Chichi said as Videl felt something get clipped to her clothes, then her mouth filled with something large and rubbery before Chichi exclaimed "Open your eyes sweetie, time to see your pretty new outfit!" Videl immediately opened her eyes and saw her reflection in the mirror. She saw herself standing there, her hair in her usual style of pigtails, wearing a white shirt with Hello Kitty on the front, frilly pale pink socks and solid bright pink shortalls with a large daisy stitched onto the chest. There was also a large purple pacifier in bobbing rhythmically in her mouth, its shield formed to the contours of her mouth and the large rubber nipple sat deep in her mouth and completely filled it making comprehensible speech impossible. Upon taking in her full appearance, Videl had to admit, she looked just like a baby or a toddler. "I figured since you're wearing diapers you should wear something age-appropriate for someone wearing diapers as well, and I must say you look absolutely adorable!" Chichi said happily as she hugged Videl from behind. "So Videl, do you like your new outfit?" asked Chichi
11133111.title: clothes that are age appropriate for a young to...

111331111.content:
Videl's immediate response was to spit out the pacifier in her mouth and demand that Chichi put her into some adult clothes but, as she stood there looking at herself and thinking about what had happened for her to find herself in this situation as well as Chichi's reaction to her doing so; Videl found that she just couldn't bring herself to do it. And so, faced with her own indecision about her current predicament, Videl looked at herself in the mirror for a bit longer before she closed her eyes and began to think, subconsciously suckling on her pacifier as she did so.

"Okay Videl, think! How did you end up standing in front of a mirror, dressed like an overgrown toddler and sucking on a giant pacifier? Well, I was in the bathroom and decide that it might be cool to try on a diaper. Then Chichi caught me in the act and decided to diaper me herself and then when I asked for some clothes she dressed me up in these baby things. That raises a lot of question like why did she decide to diaper me and why was she okay with me wearing diapers? Also why does she have baby clothes and a pacifier that seem to be perfectly sized to fit me? I want answers to all of these questions but, I guess it would be rude of me to answer her question with another. How do I feel about 'my new outfit'? I don't know. Well let's go through the pro's and con's of all of this. Okay so, these diapers are really comfortable and somewhat comforting as I feel safe for some reason. These clothes are also really comfortable and, I have to admit, They're really, really cute. Lastly, this pacifier is extremely comforting to suck on. Alright we've established the pro's what are the con's? Well it would be really, really embarrassing if any of my friends were to see me like this. Also, it's kind of humiliating to be treated like a baby at my age. However, Gohan, Goten, trunks and Vegeta are all gone all gone on a training trip, and the rest of my friends are gone vacation so no one would see me. Lastly, Chichi doesn't seem to be doing this because she wants to humiliate me, she seems to want to make happy and take care of me." Videl thought as she stood in front of the mirror however, her eyes immediately shot open when she felt a par of arms snake their way around her waist.

After asking her question Chichi moved back away from Videl and sat softly on her bed. Chichi watched Videl as she closed her eyes and seemed to think really hard about her answer. As the minutes passed and Videl was still thinking, Chichi began to worry that her actions were to much for the girl and wanted to calm her down so, with that in mind, Chichi stood up from her bed and walked up to Videl and gave her hug from behind and spoke softly "Videl sweetie, are you okay? I hope that my actions haven't scared you or anything, please let me know if it's too much and we'll stop okay?"

Videl blushed at hug and began speaking rapidly but, all that came out was incomprehensible babbling.

At this, Chichi began chuckling softly causing Videl to blush in embarrassment. Chichi then took the younger girl by the hand and lead her over to the bed. Next she sat down then pulled Videl onto her lap so that she was sitting comfortable and leaning into her allowing her to cuddle the young girl. Lastly she reached up and pulled the purple pacifier out of her mouth with a wet popping sound "You need to take this out when talking in order to be understood sweetheart but, that babbling you were doing was really cute you can continue that if you want, now what was it you were trying to say?"

Videl blushed to the roots at Chichi's actions and thus, she was too embarrassed to speak right away and needed a moment to composed herself. So, she sat for a while on Chichi's lap, enjoying the warmth and love the woman provided while she got it together before finally speaking with smile of her own "well, to answer your previous question Chichi, these clothes are absolutely gorgeous and I really like them but, I have a few questions. How did you get these baby things and why do they seem perfectly sized to fit me? Why are you okay with me wearing diapers? And lastly, why did you diaper me and dress me like a baby, where are you going with all of this?"

Chichi smiled happily upon hearing Videl's answer and then tilted her head pensively as she thought about Videl's questions as she thought about how to answer them all. Only when she felt that her answers were adequately thought through did Chchi answer the girl and, when she did she spoke softly with a smile on her face. "My father is still the Ox King Videl, so it was really easy for me to get these things and they seem to be sized perfectly for you because they are. Those clothes and diapers are your exact size and that pacifier was created specifically to fit your jaw size. I'm okay with you wearing diaper because I figured that you were interested in them as a stress reliever and it's perfectly harmless. The last answer to your question has two parts to it so, bear with me please. Firstly, I saw that you were interested in diapers before this and I thought that it was really cute so I wanted to help you with it. Lastly I've always wanted a daughter and I know that you lost your mother when you were very young. The boys and Vegeta will be gone on their training trip for the next three months so, keeping all of that in mind, I was hoping that you would be my baby girl while they're gone. Please don't mistake this as me trying to replace your mother, I just want to show you what it's like to have a mother and in the process I'd like to discover what it's like to have a daughter too." when she finished speaking she was still smiling but, she had tears in her eyes as well but, she just looked at the girl in her lap and waited to hear what she would say.

Videl was absolutely shocked as she listened to the lengths Chichi had gone to in order to set all of this up. Getting clothes and diapers made in her size was one thing but, to go so far as to have pacifier made specifically to fit her jaw size, it was mind blowing. By the end of Chichi's explanation Videl was at a loss for words and was silently crying as well, she couldn't think of the words to say yes at the moment so she just adjust her self so that she sitting in Chichi's lap and facing her and then hugged the woman as tight she could while simultaneously nodding her head and then resting it on the woman's shoulder when she finished.

Chichi was slightly surprised by strength of Videls hug but, she soon got over it and hugged her just as tightly, crying in happiness as well. They stayed like that for several moments, deriving comfort from each other as a new mother/daughter bonds started to form. After a few moments Chichi got a hold of her emotions and pulled back slightly from the hug and smiled brightly at Videl. "Alright, since you've agreed to be my baby girl I think the first order of business is to make you a nice bottle and feed it to you while I explain the rules. Here sweetie, suck on this while you're waiting and I'll put chocolate milk in your bottle instead of white." Chichi said with a wide smile as she picked up Videl's pacifier and inserted into the girls mouth. With her piece said, Chichi placed one hand under Videl's diapered bottom and placed to other on her back to holder her so she was resting on her shoulder and stood up and made her way back to the living room where she placed Videl on the floor with a pat on the head a said "stay hear for a minute sweetie and I'll be back with you bottle shortly." and left to make the bottle.

Videl was slightly disappointed when Chichi pulled back from the hug but, she didn't mind too much once she heard what Chichi said, she even happily suckled her pacifier, eager for some chocolate milk even if it would be in a bottle. Videl pouted a bit when she was put down but, logically, she know that Chichi couldn't carry her and the bottle as well; despite being treated as one, she was bigger and heavier than a baby. So she just sat on the floor on her thickly diapered rump, suckling her pacifier rhythmically as she waited patiently for Chichi to return with her bottle. One Chichi returned and sat on the couch with the bottle of chocolate milk, Videl wasted no time in immediately crawling over to the couch and laying on it with her upper body laying in Chichi's lap. Videl quickly removed her pacifier and left it laying on her chest while opened her mouth wide in anticipation of the bottle and waited to be fed.

Chichi smiled down at Videl and gently placed the nipple of the bottle into her mouth and then quickly instructed her on how to drink from the bottle before explaining the rules. "Okay Videl, just suck on the nipple as you would you pacifier but, do it slowly otherwise you'll get tummy ache. Now while you're living here as my baby girl, the rules will be simple: 1. You will wear and use diapers 24/7 for their intended purpose. 2. I will be responsible for dressing and feeding you, you can't do it yourself. 3. you cannot go anywhere by yourself. And, this one isn't a rule but, I would really like it if you called me mommy." Chichi let that sink in for a moment before she spoke up again "After you've finished your bottle you have the option of staying here to play or going out to shop for things to set up your nursery but, finish your bottle fist please".

Videl calmly finished her bottle of chocolate milk and, while Chichi was burping her, she decided to...
111331111.title: Videl becomes Chichi's baby girl for a while.

11133112.content:
"All I could find for you right now is this," Chi-Chi said, handing Videl a nightshirt of somewhat oriental design, clearly belonging to Chichi herself. "I hope it's alright."

"It's perfectly fine. Thank you." Videl nodded, accepting the nightshirt politely before pulling it on over her head.

"Hm. It fits you pretty good." Chi-Chi grinned. "I'd hoped it would. Would you like some tea while we wait for our clothes to finish?"

"Yes please." Videl answered politely. "But, uh, ma'am? Aren't you going to put anything on?" Sure enough, Chi-Chi still wasn't wearing anything except for her diaper, which Videl found to be a little bit awkward.

"I'll find something to throw on later." She shrugged casually. Videl simply stared perplexedly at the older woman. She had considered Chi-Chi to be strict, orderly, prim, proper, and modest. And now, of all times, she was being so casual about her own nudity?

"Tea's ready!" Chi-Chi announced a few minutes later, stepping out with two cups of steaming hot tea.

"Thank you." Videl smiled, accepting her cup. "By the way, ma'am. You said these diapers are yours, right?"

"That's right." Chi-Chi nodded. "Why do you ask?"

"Well.... why do you wear them?" Videl asked.

Chi-Chi replied with...
11133112.title: clothes that are age approprate for a teenager

choices: A baby bottle full of milk for Videl and a cup of tea for herself.
A cup of tea for the both of them.
111331122.content:
Chichi sat dazed, for about 30 seconds before smiling brightly and responding with " I simply enjoy wearing them, thats all dear."

Videl was shocked at getting such a simple and honest answer from Chichi and it came as no surprise when the girls next question was "why Chichi?"

Chichi smiled brightly at the openly diapered girl and said " well lots of reasons really the first is that as far as panties go, you won't find a more comfortable pair around. The second reason is that they're extrenely practical and it's fun to wet them. And the third reason is that, at times it can be fun to relax and regress a little bit."

Videl looked down and thought on what Chichi had said and what it all meant. She only looked up when she heard Chichi ask "Hey Videl, would you like something to drink?"

Videl immediately became aware of thirsty she was and replied with "Yes please!" Chichi smiled at the girls manners and then stood up and went into the kitchen, Videl heard somes noise as Chichi fiddled around and, after a few minutes she returned with...
111331122.title: Chichi wears diapers because she likes them.

choices: Yes (interested in knowing what Chichi meant)
No (This is good enough for me)
1113311221.content:
"Uh... ma'am?" Videl blinked, eyeing the baby bottle of milk that Chichi gave her. "What is this??"

"It's milk, Videl." Chichi answered simply.

"Uh, I know, but... why milk? Why in a baby bottle?"

"I told you, it can be fun to relax and regress a little bit." Chichi smiled. "I like to take a little milk in a bottle myself now and then when the boys are away. I find it relaxing. Go ahead, have some!"

"Um... okay." Videl muttered uncertainly. This was the first time in many, many years she had ever drank from such a source, but she shrugged, accepting the bottle, and lightly sucked on the nipple, cool milk filling her mouth. It was probably the first time in a long time that she'd ever had milk.

"Well?" Chichi grinned. "How is it?"

"It's good. Thank you." Videl replied, drinking some more. "I don't think i've had milk in a long time."

"Well that's no good!" Chichi giggled. "You're still a growing girl! You could use the nutrients."

"Yes, ma'am." Videl chuckled, sucking down more milk. There was something of a strange... satisfaction the Videl got from sucking on the rubber end of a bottle that she felt she wouldn't have gotten drinking straight from a cup as Chichi did, and despite being fully potty trained, she found herself wetting her diaper just by thinking it as she felt the urge to go.


"Well..." Chichi said as she and Videl finished their refreshments. "Did you like it?"

"Yeah." Videl admitted.

"So then. Would you like to regress a little bit more? Just for a bit?"

"Regress a little more?" Videl replayed in her mind, stuck between curious and uncertain of what Chichi meant.
1113311221.title: A baby bottle full of milk for Videl and a cup ...

choices: regress slowly and see if she likes it.
go all out and regress fully.
11133112211.content:
"I have to admit I'm a little curious about regressing, however, I don't understand what you mean, could lease explain it more?" said Videl while figeting in her damp diaper.

Chichi, having noticed that Videl had wet her diaper, pulled the diapered girl off of the couch and lower her to the floor so that she could change her; as Chichi did this she said "Sure Videl but, I think you need to be changed." with a smirk.

Chichi immediately got the supplies together and proceeded to change Videl. While changing Videl, Chichi explained "The way I see it Videl if you do decide regress you have two options 1.) We could go shopping together and grab and personalize the itens you wouod need to help you regress such as: your own diapers, bottles, toys, etc.and take it slow, day by day Or 2.) We could go all out in which case it would go and call Bulma and get her to get me the capsule building that designs a full scale nursery based on your measurements."

After doing up the tabs on Videls ckean diaper Chichi gave the front a couple of soft pats and smiled "So Videl what would you like to do"

Videl sat up and thought quietly while thinking carefully about the information sh'd be given, in the end Videl decided to...
11133112211.title: Yes (interested in knowing what Chichi meant)

111331122111.content:
"Alright then, honey. Let's start off with diapers." Chichi decided.

"Hm?" Videl blinked. "But I thought that was already covered?" She gave her own padding a rub.

"Not this kind, Videl." Chichi giggled. "These are the pharmacy-brand 'adult incontinence briefs'. If you're looking for the real deal in baby comfort..." She dragged out a few brown boxes. "These are the kind you want."

"What's that?"

"Infancia brand diapers." Chichi smiled. "Made for the adult size, with the baby's comfort in mind. Pick whichever one you want." She took out one diaper for each box, each one with a colorful, babyish design, except for one, which was plain white without any print.

She decided on....
111331122111.title: regress slowly and see if she likes it.

1113311221112.content:
"You seem to like the designs best." Chichi grinned.

"They have a... certain appeal to them." Videl smiled sheepishly.

"I might like these better, but you're not changing into one of those until you use the one you're wearing." Chichi said in a playful tone."Until then, which of these do you want?"

Videl scanned over the printed diapers, her favorites being one with pink hearts, another with teddy bears, and another with ABC blocks spelling out Chichi's name.

"I can get those in your name for you if you want." Chichi offered.
1113311221112.title: One with designs

11133112211121.content:
"I'd like that." Videl nodded. After a quick call, some express shipping and diaper usage, Videl's new diapers arrived, and she couldn't help but feel a bit of excitement at the idea of trying them on. She started to unfold one, but Chichi stopped her.
